cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format (999.999.999.999) will cause NG interface connection failure and prevent NGAP message exchange.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid TDD configuration and frame structure failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的 TDD 配置，並造成幀結構失敗。
